column2: Arguing with adults, peers, parents, siblings, etc.
column3: Μαλώνει με τους ενήλικες, τους συμμαθητές, τους γονείς, τα αδέλφια, κλπ.
column4: Litiga con adulti, compagni, genitori, fratelli, etc.
column5: Discute com adultos, colegas, pais, irmãos, etc.

column2: Backchatting to adults, parents, carers, etc.
column3: Αντιμιλά στους ενήλικες, τους γονείς, τους περιθάλποντες, κλπ.
column4: Risponde in modo impertinete agli adulti, genitori, assistenti, etc.
column5: É impertinente com adultos, pais, cuidadores, etc.

column2: Banging chairs, doors, tables.
column3: Χτυπάει τις καρέκλες, τις πόρτες, τα τραπέζια.
column4: Sbatte le sedie, porte, tavoli
column5: Atira com as cadeiras, mesas, portas.

column2: Blurting out answers before questions have been completed/without permission
column3: Αναφωνεί τις απαντήσεις πριν οι ερωτήσεις ολοκληρωθούν/ γραφούν/ χωρίς άδεια
column4: Interrompe prima che la domanda sia stata completata/senza permesso
column5: Responde antes de as questões estarem concluídas/sem autorização

column2: Breaking rules
column3: Παραβιάζει τους κανόνες
column4: Infrange le regole
column5: Infringe as regras

column2: Bullying adults, peers, parents, siblings, etc.
column3: Φοβερίζει τους ενήλικες, τους συμμαθητές, τους γονείς, τα αδέλφια, κλπ.
column4: Fa il bullo con adulti, compagni, genitori, fratelli, etc.
column5: Intimida adultos, colegas, pais, irmãos, etc.

column2: Climbing on furniture, buildings, etc.
column3: Σκαρφαλώνει σε έπιπλα, κτίρια, κλπ.
column4: Si arrampica sui mobili, muri, etc.
column5: Trepa para cima de móveis, edifícios.

column2: Destroying personal and/or others property
column3: Καταστρέφει την προσωπική ιδιοκτησία ή την ιδιοκτησία των άλλων
column4: Distrugge le proprie cose e quelle degli altri
column5: Destrói objetos pessoais e de outros

column2: Having difficulty awaiting turn in games or group situations
column3: Δυσκόλευεται να περιμένει τη σειρά του σε παιχνίδια ή σε ομαδικές καταστάσεις
column4: Ha difficoltà a rispettare il turno nei giochi o in situazioni di gruppo
column5: Tem dificuldade em esperar pela sua vez em situações de jogo ou de grupo

column2: Fidgeting with hands or feet, or squirms in seat
column3: Κουνάει νευρικά τα χέρια ή τα πόδια, ή στριφοργυρίζει στη θέση του/της
column4: Si agita con le mani o piedi, si dimena sulla sedia
column5: Irrequieto, mexe repetidamente as mãos e os pés, torce-se quando está sentado

column2: Having impulsive risk behaviours when out walking with parents/carers (e.g. crossing roads without looking, running off or behaving in unexpected ways)
column3: Συμπεριφέρεται παρορμητικά και ριψοκίνδυνα όταν περπατάει με τους γονείς/περιθάλποντες (π.χ. διασχίζει το δρόμο χωρίς να δει, απομακρύνεται ή συμπεριφέρεται απροσδόκητα
column4: Ha comportamenti rischiosi, impulsivi e imprevedibili, quando esce con i genitori/assistenti
column5: Tem comportamentos impulsivos de risco quando passeia com os pais/cuidadores (ex. atravessar a rua sem olhar, correr ou comportar-se de forma inesperada)

column2: Interrupting or intruding on others
column3: Διακόπτει ή επεμβαίνει σε τρίτους
column4: Interrompe o si intromette
column5: Interrompe ou incomoda os outros

column2: Jumping on furniture, things/from high places
column3: Πηδάει
column4: Salta sui mobili, sulle cose/da posti alti
column5: Salta

column2: Lying to adults, peers, carers, siblings, etc.
column3: Ψεύδεται σε ενήλικες, συμμαθητές, περιθάλποντες, αδέλφια, κλπ.
column4: Mente agli adulti, compagni, assistenti, fratelli, etc.
column5: Mente aos adultos, colegas, cuidadores, irmãos, etc.

column3: Τρώει τα νύχια του/της ή έχει κάποιο τικ
column4: Si mangia le unghie o ha tic
column5: Rói as unhas

column2: Being restlessness
column3: Είναι ανεξάντλητος/η
column4: E' irrequieto

column2: Playing roughly
column3: Παίζει ανταγωνιστικά
column4: Gioca in maniera irruenta
column5: Brinca de forma dura/arrojada

column2: Being rude to parents, carers, siblings, peers, strangers, etc.
column3: Αυθαδιάζει σε γονείς, περιθάλποντες, αδέλφια, συμμαθητές, αγνώστους, κλπ.

column5: Falta ao respeito aos pais, cuidadores, irmãos, colegas, estranhos, etc.

column3: Τρέχει μέσα στην τάξη, στο σπίτι, κλπ.
column4: Corre per la classe, per la casa, etc.

column3: Επισπεύδει τις δραστηριότητές του/της
column4: E' sbrigativo nel portare avanti le attività
column5: Despacha/apressa as atividades

column2: Shouting
column3: Φωνάζει
column4: Grida
column5: Grita

column3: Κλέβει αντικείμενα από το σπίτι, τα καταστήματα, τα αδέλφια, κλπ.

column5: Rouba coisas de sua casa, de lojas, dos irmãos, etc.

column3: Παίρνει ή αρπάζει αντικείμενα από άλλους

column2: Talking excessively
column3: Μιλάει ακατάπαυστα

column2: Tapping

column4: Tamburella
column5: Tamborila

column4: Prende in giro i compagni, fratelli
column5: Provoca os colegas, os irmãos

column2: Touching, hugging or tapping others without permission
column3: Αγγίζει, αγκαλιάζει ή χτυπάει τους άλλους χωρίς άδεια
column4: Tocca, stringe gli altri senza permesso
column5: Toca ou abraça os outros sem autorização

column2: Avoids or fails to complete class work
column3: Αποφεύγει ή αποτυγχάνει να ολοκληρώσει τις σχολικές του/της εργασίες
column4: Evità o non riesce a completare i compiti
column5: Não completa ou evita os trabalhos na aula

column2: Completes homework but is disorganised about keeping it safe or handing it in
column3: Ολοκληρώνει τις σχολικές του εργασίες αλλά δεν είναι οργανωμένος/η για τη φύλαξη ή την παράδοση τους
column4: Completa i compiti ma è disorganizzato nella loro gestione
column5: Completa os trabalhos-de-casa, no entanto é desorganizado em relação à sua entrega

column2: Daydreaming
column3: Ονειροπολεί
column4: Sogna ad occhi aperti
column5: Sonha acordado

column3: Δυσκολεύεται να εφαρμόσει τις προφορικές οδηγίες στην πράξη
column4: Ha difficoltà a mettere in pratica le istruzioni fornitegli
column5: Tem dificuldade em concretizar as instruções orais que recebe

column3: Δυσκολεύεται στις καθημερινές συνήθειες (π.χ. πλύσιμο δοντιών, λούσιμο, προετοιμασία σχολικής τσάντας, κλπ.)

column4: Ha difficoltà a mantenere la concentrazione

column4: Non segue le indicazioni fornitegli dagli adulti
column5: Não segue as instruções dos adultos

column3: Διασπάται εύκολα από εσωτερικές σκέψεις
column4: E' distratto dai propri pensieri
column5: Distrai-se facilmente com os seus pensamentos

column4: Non sa mai dove sono le cose

column3: Συχνά δεν έχει τον απαραίτητο σχολικό εξοπλισμό

column2: Often slow to get ready for family trips

column5: É frequentemente lento a preparar-se para as viagens da família

column2: Often wears dirty clothes

column4: Spesso indossa vestiti sporchi
column5: Suja-se com facilidade

column2: Pays more attention when close to the sound
column3: Προσέχει περισσότερο όταν βρίσκεται κοντά σε ήχο
